data.name: 0000 (095.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: You give off the impression of an alpha wolf.

data.name: 0001 (095.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Meaning?

data.name: 0002 (095.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: You're self-centered and don't listen to others--like a "shut up, just follow me" vibe.

data.name: 0003 (095.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: You're just misunderstanding.

data.name: 0004 (095.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: I listen when I'm supposed to, then I follow the best opinion.

data.name: 0005 (095.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: It's just that so far no one has come up with a better idea than me.

data.name: 0006 (095.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: In other words—shutting up and doing what I say is the best option.

data.name: 0007 (095.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: My goodness--she gave the exact sort of self-centered answer I'd expect from her.

data.name: 0008 (095.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: That's the way it is, so how about you share some constructive ideas every so often?

data.name: 0009 (095.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: If you don't use that brain in your head, it'll atrophy.

data.name: 0010 (095.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Thanks for letting me know.

data.name: 0011 (095.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: You're really like a wolf, aren't you?

data.name: 0012 (095.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Seriously?

data.name: 0013 (095.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Let's see, then Kyon would be…

data.name: 0014 (095.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Hmm… I sort of feel like we've talked about this before.

data.name: 0015 (095.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: It was Kyon who brought it up originally.

data.name: 0016 (095.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: All things considered, Kyon is very dog-like, isn't he?

data.name: 0017 (095.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Particularly how he's usually lazing around, but he'll reluctantly move if you ask.

data.name: 0018 (095.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: That's not true… Kyon'll get mad if he hears you say that.

data.name: 0019 (095.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: It's alright. After all, dogs learn a lot from getting scolded.

data.name: 0020 (095.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Discipline, as they say. Discipline.

data.name: 0021 (095.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: I'm correcting that lazy bystander personality for him.

data.name: 0022 (095.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Like any good owner should.

data.name: 0023 (095.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: It's time for him to awaken his loyal instincts and meet me at the front gate every day.

data.name: 0024 (095.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Um, things have gotten a little off-topic…

data.name: 0025 (095.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: If he tragically dies while diligently waiting, I'll build a bronze statue in his honor.

data.name: 0026 (095.ja) NAGATO (長門)
data.value: Are you an alpha wolf?

data.name: 0027 (095.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: What are you saying?

data.name: 0028 (095.ja) NAGATO (長門)
data.value: He told me.

data.name: 0029 (095.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: "He" could only be Kyon.

data.name: 0030 (095.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: He's the only one I can imagine coming up with such crude gossip.

data.name: 0032 (095.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: I have no idea what on earth he could be thinking.

data.name: 0033 (095.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: But I have no doubt he's making fun of me.

data.name: 0034 (095.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Yuki, you did well to report this to me!

data.name: 0035 (095.ja) NAGATO (長門)
data.value: That is a misunderstanding.

data.name: 0036 (095.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: I'll take it out on Kyon later!

data.name: 0038 (095.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: This is simply what he told me, but you're somewhat like an alpha wolf.

data.name: 0039 (095.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Ehh? What's that supposed to mean?

data.name: 0040 (095.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: Most likely, that you're the powerful leader of the group.

data.name: 0041 (095.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: I think it describes how you're skilled at leading those around you.

data.name: 0042 (095.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Hmm… I see…

data.name: 0043 (095.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: That's a pretty good comparison coming from Kyon—even if it's oddly hard to understand.

data.name: 0044 (095.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: Otherwise, it may contain dictatorial implications…

data.name: 0045 (095.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: This is Kyon we're talking about, so it's definitely the latter.

data.name: 0046 (095.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: The only thing he's ever good for is complaining, after all.

data.name: 0047 (095.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Do you think I should discipline him a bit later?

data.name: 0048 (095.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: I don't believe he intended to offend you. Speaking openly about you is a sign of trust.

data.name: 0049 (095.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: It's not like you have to defend him or anything, Koizumi.

data.name: 0050 (095.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: I bet he said it with the same boorish face he always makes.

data.name: 0051 (095.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: Spot on—as if you were really there to see it.

data.name: 0052 (095.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: I'm gonna give that Kyon so many chores later, and he's gonna hate it.

data.name: 0053 (095.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Actually, maybe I should just make him treat us again or something?

data.name: 0054 (095.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: …It seems like things took a turn for the worse.
